Text: I'm not gonna bitch about peoples preferences. I just try to share with my family. And its much better on the TV than us gathered around a 22 inch monitor trying to watch an mp4, mkv or whatever. A BIG thanks to those that still put up an avi or xvid. And I appreciate everyone's work no matter what format. We're all in this together. Enjoy the free ride.

Thank you so much for the file! I agree with @Crashsq, since I also watch the files on my TV rather than on the computer. That's why I keep coming back to your posts! Thank you so much, I appreciate your effort!
Another thumbs up for the avi format and watching on TV rather than computer monitor  :-)
